Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2007 08:05PM Carol_D wrote: My surgeon wouldn't do an SNB even though I asked. I can't remember his exact words but it was something like "we're going to remove lymph nodes at the time of surgery anyway so there's no reason." Well, after surgery I found out that no lymph nodes were removed because the tissue he removed didn't contain any. So I wish I'd had the SNB.
